description.english: Change your theme and ship for the first time.
Rescue your first cow from captivity.
Complete at least a single sector in local multiplayer.
Collect another shield while you already have one.
Level up one of your clones.
You have 5% chance of getting this achievement.
Clear a sector without destroying a single enemy.
Defeat a boss without collecting a single ring.
Last a whole minute in a single Endless Mode run without collecting a single ring.
Last a whole minute in Endless Mode without moving left even once.
Have perfect accuracy and do not miss a single shot for a whole minute in Endless Switcher Mode.
Last 2 minutes in Survival Mode without missing a single ring.
Clear 10 sectors in a single run.
Clear 20 sectors in a single run.
Get 10 ring chains in a single Endless Mode run.
Get 20 ring chains in a single Endless Mode run.
Spend at least an hour in-game.
Get the top place on the Classic Mode local leaderboard.
Get the top place on the Endless Mode local leaderboard.
Get the top place on the Switcher Mode local leaderboard.
Get the top place on the Endless Switcher Mode local leaderboard.
Get the top place on the Survival Mode local leaderboard.
Get the top place on the Arcade Mode local leaderboard.
Get the top place on the Arcade Switcher Mode local leaderboard.
